title-group.article-title: Capacity Planning and Productivity â€” A Tutorial

permissions.copyright-statement: Copyright 1982 Society of Automotive Engineers, Inc.

abstract.p: Factors which determine the throughput capacity of flow lines with varying operation times or availability are presented by simple examples. An extensive bibliography of analytic studies on flow line design is included.
